title: and Archaeological Heritage and Miscellaneous Provisions Act 2023 (No. 26 of
heading: 1. These Regulations may be cited as the Historic and Archaeological
text_raw:
1. These Regulations may be cited as the Historic and Archaeological 

Heritage (Notification of Possession of Records) Regulations 2024.
text_norm: 1 regulation may cited historic archaeological heritage (notification possession records) regulation 2024

title: and Archaeological Heritage and Miscellaneous Provisions Act 2023 (No. 26 of
heading: 2. These Regulations shall come into operation on the 30th day of
text_raw:
2. These Regulations shall come into operation on the 30th day of 

September, 2024.
text_norm: 2 regulation shall come operation 30th day september 2024

title: and Archaeological Heritage and Miscellaneous Provisions Act 2023 (No. 26 of
heading: 3. A notification to a relevant authority under section 159(2) of the Historic
text_raw:
3. A notification to a relevant authority under section 159(2) of the Historic 
and Archaeological Heritage and Miscellaneous Provisions Act 2023 (No. 26 of 
2023) shall be made in the following manner: 

(a) 

by registered post to the address of the head office of the relevant 
authority, and 

(b) by email to the address specified on the website of the relevant 

authority.
text_norm: 3 notification relevant authority section 159(2) historic archaeological heritage miscellaneous provision act 2023 (no 26 2023) shall made following manner (a) registered post address head office relevant authority (b) email address specified website relevant authority

title: and Archaeological Heritage and Miscellaneous Provisions Act 2023 (No. 26 of
heading: 4. A notification referred to in Regulation 3 shall -
text_raw:
4. A notification referred to in Regulation 3 shall - 

(a) be clearly marked “Notification under section 159(2)” by the 

person making the notification, and 

(b) 

in addition to the matters specified in section 159(2), state any 
number or other unique identifier which was issued with the new 
authorisation or old authorisation, as the case may be, where this 
is known to the person making the notification. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

25 September, 2024. 

DARRAGH O’BRIEN, 

Minister for Housing, Local Government and Heritage. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 27th September, 2024. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [492] 3
